Posts.EditableText: Is there anyway to input a $ dollar sign into a turn counter display. It comes up as an error i assume because of the sign but, is there a way to type it to let Quest realize that it's for display and not a command. When i put $ next to the integer in the game it says <ERROR>
Posts.HTML: Is there anyway to input a $ dollar sign into a turn counter display. It comes up as an error i assume because of the sign but, is there a way to type it to let Quest realize that it's for display and not a command. When i put $ next to the integer in the game it says <ERROR>

Posts.EditableText: The $ sign is used to call a function. If you just want to print a $ sign, just use two together: $$
